TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN SECURITY <ASEC> TO RELEASE INFORMATION
TEXT.BODY: American Security Corp said a release will be forthcoming shortly regarding its pending merger with Maryland National Corp <MDNT>, approved by its stockholders October 10. American was halted on NASDAQ pending a news announcement. Reuter
